page.title: 10TRANSPORT IN HARBURY 1985
page.content: Situated 2 miles off Fosse Way, 9 miles from Leamington Spa, 5 miles from Southam, with no Railway Station, Harbury villagers reliant on own transport or Midland Red Bus Service. No bus service on Sunday. 6 buses to Leamington and back,daily Monday to Friday. 5 on Saturdays. Same number run to Southam. Southam and Leamington Spa are nearest shopping centres. Special coach runs to Moreton-in-the-Marsh Tuesday Market every week for 30p return. In our survey of l38 households only 5 people use the bus daily and 98 never use them.
